Text: RE Whats upWell we are having to sell it because we are so short of cash right now Really for a lot of reasons We have had to make an investment of our own to do a demo so we could shop it to labels in the US This is working out well as we have had a few discussions already Also there have been some serious changes in the way US Immigration is working and it has really screwed a lot of touring bands It has made us cancel already shows for September They basically changed the rules overnight on everybody There is nothing we can do about it unless we know a member of Congress or we have a US We may have to come up with the We think that we may be able to book tours that will allow us to just rent a vehicle when we need one That is what we are looking at right now I am at home by the way and here until at least the th of September Original Message From Tycholiz Barry mailtoBarry NRONcom Sent Tuesday August AM To Subject RE Whats up Why are you selling the van Dont you need to get around I am not sure what the outstanding balance is I will have to check my notes Are you in Canada or the US BT Original Message From Rockin Highliners mailto Sent Monday August PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject RE Whats up I was going to send you one in a day or so after I figured out what was going on We have put some money already in the bank this month Ken put in and we are trying to get the rest in before the end of the month We are also trying to sell the van Its tough right now and we need to make a few changes We of course would sell it and pay off the loan with you I believe it is around or just under We will have to work out a specific balance with you I hope to sell it soon but we will have to wait and see Mom does sound well although I wonder if you think she is getting the best advice from her lawyer I just think she should get this over with Sounds like maybe she is reticent to go any further Let me know what you think of all this Original Message From Tycholiz Barry mailtoBarry NRONcom Sent Monday August PM To Subject Whats up Hehwhats going on we have not heard from you for a while are you making a payment for august Have you been traveling alot How are things in general Mom sounds pretty good talk to you soon BT This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
